summary: Frontend adds a weight+trap-speed calculator UI with client-side validation and a results panel, plus theme styling. However, backend computation/canister integration is incorrect/missing, required generated image assets are not present in the diff, and the results reset action is not implemented in the results panel. The diff also introduces Internet Identity/auth-related hooks (a stated non-goal) and a different horsepower calculation (torque/rpm) in the backend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement the horsepower calculation in the Motoko backend as a query method (weight + trap speed) and have the frontend call it; show a clear error state on backend failure.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend method signature and formula do not match (uses torque/rpm), and the frontend performs the calculation locally with a simulated delay rather than calling the canister. No backend failure error state is evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Results panel includes a reset/clear action that returns the form to its initial state.
missing_requirements.reason: ResultsPanel declares an onReset prop but does not render any Reset/Clear control and does not use the onReset prop; while App has handleReset, there is no evidence it is wired into the results panel UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: Commit generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the UI (logo in header; subtle background).
missing_requirements.reason: UI references /assets/generated/dragstrip-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, but no generated image files are included in the diff summary under frontend/public/assets/generated (and no logo asset evidence is shown).

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication and identity-dependent actor creation logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/Internet Identity authentication as a non-goal, but the diff adds InternetIdentityProvider and hooks using @dfinity/auth-client and identity-based actor selection.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend horsepower calculation based on torque and RPM (HP=(torque*rpm)/5252).
hallucinated_features.reason: Requested calculator is weight + quarter-mile trap speed (HP = weight * (trapSpeed/234)^3). Backend implements a different calculation with different parameters.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media icon integration (X/Facebook/Instagram) and additional UI elements not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of any requirement and outside the described single-purpose calculator scope.
